page.title: 17CALMORE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: In 1965 the first industry developed around Nutsey Lane.The 1st.stage of the estate was built about 1979,the 2nd.in 1983, there is a 3rd.and final stage which will initially consist of a cement works in the centre of the new area. { The estate is built {upon farmland reclaimed from gravel {workings.}Many firms have warehouses or salepoints here,mostly in small scale units,but there is little manufacturing on the site.The{site was {chosen to cause the minimum of {annoyance to local residents;there is {an effective tree screening between it {and the housing estate and the {prevailing wind carries any pollution {away from the housing areas.There have been very few complaints over the years from local residents.
